Name: Shinyuusha
description: You're a new recruit to the office. Get to know your coworkers and boss to reach the next level of Ippanshain:a regular employee.

Name: Ippanshain
description: You're a regular employee now! But if you work hard you can become a Section Chief:Kakarichou.

Name: Kakarichou
description: You are officially better than other people now. But with more effort you could be promoted to a full-fledged Deputy Manager:Kachoudairi.

Name: Kachoudairi
description: Well done, you've reached a true management position. But with more effort you could be promoted to a full-fledged Manager:Kachou.

Name: Kachou
description: You're the Kachou now. But don't think being manager is the end of your journey. Work hard and Buchou might take you on as his new assistant:Buchoudairi.

Name: Buchoudairi
description: You're an Assistant Manager now. You were before, too, but this time it's a more important position, I assure you. Work hard and become the true manager:Buchou.

Name: Buchou
description: This is it, you're at the top of all the managers. Well, out of all the managerial positions that is, but you'll have to work harder to become Deputy Director:Torishimariyakudairi

Name: Torishimariyakudairi
description: Well done! You're now a deputy director at your company. Keep working hard and you might even make Director before you retire:Torishimariyaku.

Name: Torishimariyaku
description: Excellent work. You're officially a director at your company. But you're not done yet! Keep up the good work and you'll be promoted to Deputy Managing Director:Jomu Torishimariyakudairi.

Name: Jomu Torishimariyakudairi
description: You're really working hard! Keep up the effort and you'll be promoted to a real Managing Director:Jomu Torishimariyaku.

Name: Jomu Torishimariyaku
description: Great job. You're reaching the upper levels of management now. Another promotion and you'll become a Deputy Senior Managing Director:Senmu Torishimariyakudairi

Name: Senmu Torishimariyakudairi
description: The last of the major hurdles is over. Just one more promotion until you reach the peak of Directorial positions:Senmu Torishimariyaku

Name: Senmu Torishimariyaku
description: Great work. You've reached the top of Directors, time to work hard to get into the coveted position of Executive Vice President:Fukushachou.

Name: Fukushachou
description: Amazing dedication has brought you this far. Just a little more work and you'll become President:Shachou.

Name: Shachou
description: Excellent. You're finally the President of your company. Some more effort and you might even make Vice Chairman:Fukukaichou.

Name: Fukukaichou
description: You're so close! Just a few more years of work and you'll be promoted to Kaichou! The Chairman. The true top of the company.

Name: Kaichou
description: You did it! You're the boss now. Nowhere to promote from here! Time to run the company.
